description: Four turbochargers. Sixteen cylinders. 1500 horsepower. The Chiron is the most powerful production car ever built, a monument to excess that somehow feels refined. It weighs two tons and still hits 261 mph. Physics doesn't apply.
lore: Four turbochargers. Sixteen cylinders. 1500 horsepower. Zero keeps it in the deepest part of the collection, under a light that makes it look like it's floating.
